sentence.text: RNA sequencing transcriptome analysis revealed that inflammatory mediators such as tumor necrosis factor (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II)-Î± suppressed expression of R-spondin-1 (Rspo1, a critical growth factor for intestinal epithelial cells) in Sirt6-silenced YAMC cells in vitro.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
